entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
